text: He jbina o manaba sampradaya, tomadera kache ki tomadera madhya theke payagambaragana agamana kareni? Yamra tomaderake amara bidhanabali barnana karatena ebam tomaderake ajakera e dinera saksatera bhiti pradarsana karatena? Tara balabeh amara sbiya gonaha sbikara kare nilama. Parthiba jibana taderake pratarita kareche. Tara nijedera birud'dhe sbikara kare niyeche ye, tara kaphera chila.
